seo.title: Guide til scooterutleie (Positano)
seo.description: Hvor du leier, regler, sikkerhet og når du bør droppe scooter.

intro: Scooters look tempting around Positano, but weigh availability, paperwork, and cliff-road safety before renting.

sections.title: Where to rent
body: Availability in Positano fluctuates and rates are high; Sorrento usually offers more choice and steadier pricing.

sections.title: Rules & documents
body: Bring your licence (plus an IDP where required) and a credit card, and double-check what the insurance actually covers.

sections.title: Safety & when to avoid
body: Coastal roads are narrow with blind bends and buses; if you’re inexperienced, ferries and buses are the safer bet.

faqs.q: Should beginners rent a scooter here?
a: Not really — without solid scooter skills those cliff roads are stressful, so stick to public transport.
